parts.text: I'm looking for a safe family SUV. What are my options with Buick?

Buick offers two excellent SUVs that are perfect for families: the Enclave and the Envision. Both have top-rated safety features. The Enclave is larger, with three rows of seating, making it ideal for bigger families or if you often have extra passengers. The Envision is a compact SUV, but it's still very spacious and comes with a lot of premium features. Do you have a preference for size?
We're a family of four, so two rows is probably enough. How do they compare on cargo space?

Great question. The Envision offers 25.2 cubic feet of cargo space behind the rear seats. If you fold the second row down, that expands to 52.7 cubic feet. The Enclave, being larger, has 23.6 cubic feet behind the third row, 57.7 cubic feet behind the second row, and a massive 97.4 cubic feet with all rear seats folded. For a family of four, the Envision should offer plenty of room for luggage, groceries, and sports equipment. Would you like to know more about the technology and entertainment features in the Envision?
Yes, tell me about the infotainment system.

The 2024 Envision comes with a stunning 30-inch diagonal screen that houses both the instrument cluster and the infotainment system. It's powered by Google built-in, which includes Google Assistant, Google Maps, and Google Play. It also has wireless Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, so you can seamlessly connect your smartphone. The system is very intuitive and user-friendly.
That sounds great. What about safety features? That's my top priority.

I completely understand. The Envision comes standard with Buick Driver Confidence, a suite of advanced safety and driver-assistance features. This includes Forward Collision Alert, Automatic Emergency Braking, Lane Keep Assist with Lane Departure Warning, Following Distance Indicator, and IntelliBeam auto high beams. Higher trims offer even more features like HD Surround Vision and a Head-Up Display. It received a 5-star overall safety rating from the NHTSA.
Wow, that's a lot of safety tech. I'm impressed. I think I'd like to schedule a test drive.
Excellent choice. I can help you with that. To schedule your test drive, I'll need your preferred dealership and a convenient date and time for you.
What are the latest offers on the Envista?

Currently, for the 2024 Buick Envista, we have a special lease offer for qualified lessees at $249 per month for 36 months, with $2,999 due at signing. We also have a low APR financing offer of 2.9% for 60 months for well-qualified buyers. These offers can vary by region, so may I have your zip code to confirm the offers in your area?
My zip code is 90210. Does the Envista have a sunroof?

Thank you. I've confirmed the offers are available in your area. Yes, the Buick Envista offers an optional power moonroof on the Sport Touring and Avenir trims. It's a great feature for letting in more natural light and fresh air. Are there any other features you're curious about?
What about fuel efficiency? I have a long commute.

The Envista is very fuel-efficient, which is perfect for a long commute. It gets an EPA-estimated 28 MPG in the city and 32 MPG on the highway. This is thanks to its 1.2L turbocharged engine, which provides a great balance of performance and economy.
Is the back seat roomy enough for adults?

Despite its sporty, coupe-like roofline, the Envista has surprisingly generous rear-seat legroom, offering 38.7 inches. This is more than many of its competitors and provides comfortable seating for adult passengers on short or long trips. Would you like to compare the Envista's interior dimensions to another vehicle?
No, that's okay. I think I have all the information I need for now. Thanks!
You're very welcome! If you have any more questions or would like to locate a dealer to see the Envista in person, feel free to ask. Have a great day!
I need to schedule a service appointment for my Enclave. The 'check engine' light just came on.

I can certainly help you with that. I'm sorry to hear about the check engine light. To book your appointment, I'll need your vehicle's VIN, your preferred dealership, and a convenient date and time for you.
I don't have the VIN on me right now. Can you look it up with my phone number?
Yes, I can. Could you please provide the phone number associated with your Buick account?
Thank you. I've found your account. You have a 2022 Buick Enclave Avenir. Is that correct?
Yes, that's the one.
Perfect. And which dealership would you like to visit?
The one on Main Street.
Got it. The 'Main Street Buick GMC' dealership. They have openings tomorrow at 10:00 AM and 2:00 PM. Would either of those work for you?
10:00 AM would be great.

Excellent. I've scheduled your appointment for tomorrow at 10:00 AM at Main Street Buick GMC to diagnose the check engine light. You'll receive a confirmation email shortly. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Actually, yes. My infotainment screen has been a bit laggy lately. Can they look at that too?
Of course. I've added a note to your appointment for the service technicians to check the infotainment system for any software updates or issues. Is there anything else?
No, that's it. Thank you for your help.
You're most welcome. We'll see you tomorrow at 10:00 AM. Have a great day!
Tell me about the warranty on a new Buick.

Of course. New Buick vehicles come with a comprehensive warranty package. This includes a Bumper-to-Bumper Limited Warranty for 3 years or 36,000 miles, whichever comes first. You also get a Powertrain Limited Warranty for 5 years or 60,000 miles. Additionally, there's Roadside Assistance and Courtesy Transportation for the duration of the Powertrain Warranty. Would you like me to explain what's covered under the Bumper-to-Bumper warranty?
Yes, please.

The Bumper-to-Bumper Limited Warranty covers repairs to correct any defect in materials or workmanship, with the exception of routine maintenance. This includes most parts of your vehicle, from the electrical system to the chassis. Things like tires are covered by their own manufacturer's warranty. It's designed to give you peace of mind during your first few years of ownership.
What about the powertrain warranty? What does that cover?

The Powertrain Limited Warranty covers the major components that make the vehicle move. This includes the engine, transmission, and drive systems. Specifically, it covers components like the engine block, cylinder heads, pistons, transmission case, torque converter, and axles. It's a long-term warranty designed to protect you from costly repairs to these essential parts.
Is there an option to extend the warranty?

Yes, Buick offers a variety of extended protection plans that can be purchased to extend your warranty coverage beyond the standard period. These plans can provide additional peace of mind and protect you from unexpected repair costs. Would you like me to provide more information on the available protection plans?
Are there any electric vehicles in the Buick lineup?

That's an exciting question! Yes, Buick is moving towards an all-electric future. While there are no fully electric models available for purchase today, Buick has announced its first all-electric vehicle, the Electra, which is expected to arrive in 2025. We also have the new Envista, which is a very fuel-efficient gasoline-powered SUV with a sleek, EV-inspired design.
Tell me more about the Electra.

The Buick Electra is expected to be a stunning electric SUV, built on GM's Ultium battery platform. This platform allows for a long range, fast charging, and impressive performance. The design is expected to be very modern and luxurious, with a focus on technology and comfort. We don't have all the official specs yet, but would you like me to sign you up for updates so you'll be the first to know when more information is released?
Yes, please do.
I can do that. What is the best email address to send the updates to?
jessica@example.com

Perfect. I've added you to our mailing list for Buick Electra updates. You'll be among the first to receive new photos, specs, and ordering information as it becomes available. Can I help with anything else today?
What is the estimated range of the Electra?

While official EPA estimates are not yet available, the Ultium platform that the Electra is built on is capable of providing a range of over 300 miles on a full charge. The final range will depend on the specific battery and motor configuration of the vehicle.
How much can the Enclave tow?

The 2024 Buick Enclave has a standard towing capacity of 1,500 pounds. However, if you opt for the Trailering Package, which is available on all trims, the maximum towing capacity increases to 5,000 pounds. This package includes a hitch, a heavy-duty cooling system, and other features to ensure safe and reliable towing.
What can you tow with 5,000 pounds?

With a 5,000-pound towing capacity, you can comfortably tow a small travel trailer, a pop-up camper, a small boat, or a trailer with a couple of ATVs or snowmobiles. It's quite a versatile towing capacity for a family SUV. Are you planning on towing something specific?
I have a 20-foot boat that weighs about 4,000 pounds with the trailer.

In that case, the Enclave with the Trailering Package would be a great choice. With a 5,000-pound capacity, it would handle your 4,000-pound boat and trailer with a comfortable margin of safety. The Trailering Package's heavy-duty cooling system would also help protect the engine and transmission during long tows.
Does the trailering package affect the fuel economy?

The trailering package itself does not significantly affect the vehicle's fuel economy in normal driving conditions. However, when you are actively towing a heavy load, you can expect the fuel economy to be lower than the EPA estimates. The actual MPG will depend on the weight of the trailer, your driving speed, and the terrain.
What is the fuel economy of the Encore GX?

The 2024 Buick Encore GX has two available engines with slightly different fuel economy ratings. The standard 1.2L turbocharged engine gets an EPA-estimated 30 MPG in the city and 31 MPG on the highway. The available 1.3L turbocharged engine gets up to 29 MPG city and 31 MPG highway with front-wheel drive, and 26 MPG city and 28 MPG highway with all-wheel drive. Do you know which engine or drivetrain you're interested in?
I live in a snowy area, so I'd probably want all-wheel drive.

That's a smart choice for a snowy climate. The Encore GX with all-wheel drive is a great option. It not only provides extra traction and control in slippery conditions but also comes with the more powerful 1.3L engine as standard. So you'd be looking at an estimated 26 MPG city and 28 MPG highway. Would you like me to help you find an Encore GX with AWD in your area?
Yes, please. My zip code is 12345.
Thank you. I'm searching for Buick Encore GX models with all-wheel drive near 12345. I've found three dealerships in your area that have them in stock. Would you like me to list them for you?
Yes, please.
The dealerships are: Albany Buick GMC, Schenectady Buick, and Troy Buick. They all have a good selection of Encore GX models with AWD. Would you like to schedule a test drive at any of them?
I want to find a dealership near me.
I can definitely help with that. To find the Buick dealerships closest to you, could you please provide your zip code or city and state?
My zip is 48201.

Thank you. There are three Buick dealerships within 15 miles of 48201. They are: Superior Buick of Detroit, Gateway Buick GMC, and Motor City Buick. Would you like me to provide the address and phone number for any of these dealerships?
Yes, for Superior Buick.
Superior Buick of Detroit is located at 1234 Woodward Ave, Detroit, MI 48201. Their phone number is (313) 555-1212. They are open from 9:00 AM to 8:00 PM today. Can I help you with anything else?
Can I get directions to there from my current location?
To provide you with directions, I'll need your current location. Would you be willing to share it with me?
I'm at the Renaissance Center.

Thank you. Getting to Superior Buick of Detroit from the Renaissance Center is quite easy. It's about a 5-minute drive. You would head northwest on Jefferson Ave, then turn right onto Woodward Ave. The dealership will be on your right. Would you like me to send these directions to your phone?
Do you have any certified pre-owned vehicles?

Yes, we have an excellent Certified Pre-Owned (CPO) program. A Buick CPO vehicle must be less than 6 years old, have fewer than 75,000 miles, and pass a rigorous 172-point vehicle inspection and reconditioning process. They also come with two factory-backed warranties, which is a great benefit.
What are the warranties?

Buick CPO vehicles come with a 6-Year/100,000-Mile Powertrain Limited Warranty and a 12-Month/12,000-Mile Bumper-to-Bumper Limited Warranty. You also get 24/7 Roadside Assistance and two included scheduled maintenance visits. It's a great way to get a like-new vehicle with the peace of mind of a warranty. Are you looking for a specific model?
I'm interested in a CPO Envision.

The Envision is a popular choice in our CPO program. We have several CPO Envision models available right now. To help me narrow down the options, do you have any preferences for trim level, color, or year?
I'd like a 2022 or 2023 model, preferably in a dark color like black or dark blue.

Great. I'm filtering our CPO inventory for 2022 and 2023 Envision models in dark colors. I've found five vehicles that match your criteria. They are all in excellent condition and have passed our 172-point inspection. Would you like me to provide the details of these vehicles, including their mileage and price?
